text: Aur baaz aisay hain jinhon ney inn aghraaz kay liye masjid banaee hai kay zarrar phonchayen aur kufur ki baaten keren aur eman daron mein tafreeq dalen aur uss shaks kay qayam ka saman keren jo iss say pehlay say Allah aur rasool ka mukhalif hai aur qasmen kha jayen gay kay ba-juz bhalaee kay aur humari kuch neeyat nahi aur Allah gawah hai kay woh bilkul jhootay hain
